long_description: Expand your repertoire of yoga poses in the prAna Misty Knickers. Flexible and comfortable, they'll keep up with your every move. Quick-drying fabric wicks moisture so you stay comfortable even when the yoga studio heats up, and spandex improves stretch and support. Flattering wide waistband with hidden key pocket. Shirring detail at back waistband and back leg. Gusset for added comfort. The prAna Misty Knickers feature a next-to-skin fit, low rise and a 16 in. inseam.
short_description: Expand your repertoire of yoga poses in the prAna Misty Knickers. Flexible and comfortable, they'll keep up with your every move.
